courseList.description: Full stack Development is one of the top in-demand skills to get placed in the IT Industry. Become a Full Stack Developer in 90 days with our AR Tech Training + 100% Placement Support.
courseList.aboutCourse: The Full Stack Web Developer Course with placement guarantee at Tap Academy will give you all the theoretical and practical exposure along with the necessary training from Rohit sir to help you shape a successful career in the IT field. Tap Academy offers a complete Full Stack Web Development course, where the concepts are presented in the most simple and visually engaging ways using the technology of Augmented Reality and gamification. In this course, you will learn the concepts, languages, and frameworks required to develop a complete web application in simple and visualised videos using Augmented Reality technology. The content will be a mix of high-end animated video lectures, talks from industry experts, live lectures, pair programming, mock sessions, interactive group discussions. We teach everything from basics & we give a personalised approach to learning for our candidates. You can expect multiple things in this program, to mention a few 100% job opportunities, world-class video lectures, hands-on tasks like case studies & projects, logic building to excel in competitive programming, instant doubt clarification support, career assistance, mentors guidance at every step, etc. You can get all your doubts clarified during live class or through our private doubt discussion forum. Our mentors will help you in every step of your learning journey. Becoming Job ready is just one TAP away..

data.answer: Tap Academy’s Full Stack Development course assumes its students are beginners in the coding world. Thus, you get to learn the core concepts, from OOP concepts and ways of building programming logic to a good understanding of Java programming language. After which, the course takes you steadily towards the intermediate and the advanced languages and frameworks. The concepts get deeper with 150+ coding questions and discussion forums.
data.question: Why Full Stack Web Development?

data.answer: As more companies seek employees who can manage both the front-end and back-end facets of web development, full stack developers are in high demand. Due to the increasing significance of having a strong online presence, the demand for Full Stack Developers has increased dramatically in recent years. Numerous programming languages and frameworks, such as Java, CSS, JavaScript, and Python as well as knowledge of databases and server-side technologies are all in high demand. Those with the necessary abilities and competence can benefit from attractive job prospects and growth potential in this profession as a result of the rising need for Full Stack Developers.
data.question: The massive demand for Full Stack Developer

data.answer: Thanks to Tap Academy’s integration of Augmented Reality in our full-stack web developer course  which has never been more thrilling and interesting. Education is made more fun and engaging by incorporating AR into FSWD. This cutting-edge method of teaching not only improves the educational experience but also improves information retention and aids Students in comprehending complex topics.. The demand for skilled Full Stack Developers is increasing. As a result of AR, learning Full Stack Web Development is not only educational but enjoyable as well, making it a fantastic option for aspiring developers who want to stand out from the competition
data.question: Full Stack Web Development - Learning made fun with AR

courseList.aboutCourse: Tap Academy's Data Structures and Algorithms course is the perfect pathway for aspiring professionals to land a job at their dream IT company. Tap Academy offers comprehensive training with augmented reality, making learning both informative and enjoyable. Whether you are a beginner or experienced coder, Tap Academy's subject matter experts have designed their course specifically in order to teach practical skills which will help prepare you for placement tests. The Data Structures and Algorithms Course consists of video lectures, quizzes, discussion forums, and coding problems -- all of which are highly rated by over 10,000 students. Tap Academy can be your ticket to success when it comes to working in the product-based IT industry.

Solutions to the problems asked by Amazon, Flipkart, Adobe, Microsoft, Apple, etc

data.answer: In order to access, manage, and modify data effectively on a computer, it must be organised and stored in a specific fashion called as Data Structure. Large volumes of data can be organised using Data Structures in a way that makes it possible to quickly and effectively access the data and perform operations like insertion, deletion, and searching. There are numerous types of data structures, each with unique benefits and applications, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs. Which Data Structure to select for a particular activity will depend on the demands and limitations of the problem at hand. Any computer programmer must have a solid understanding of data structures since they serve as the basis for developing high-performance and scalable software systems.
data.question: What is Data Structure?

data.answer: The foundation of computer programming is made up of Data Structures and Algorithms, which are essential for creating efficient, scalable, and effective software systems. A programmer may analyse, create, and implement solutions for complex problems in an optimal way by understanding these ideas. Building high-performance applications requires an understanding of data structures like arrays, linked lists, trees, and graphs as well as algorithms like sorting, searching, and recursion. They are also valuable and in-demand skills for any aspiring programmer or technology worker because they are frequently prerequisites for many advanced computer science and software engineering professions.
data.question: Why Data Structures and Algorithms?

data.answer: Data Structures can be broadly classified into two types: Linear Data Structures Arrays, linked lists, and stacks are examples of linear data structures, which store data components sequentially. Non-Linear Data Structures On the other hand, non-linear data structures, such trees and graphs, store data pieces in a hierarchical or networked fashion. Selecting the best Data Structure for a particular problem is a crucial part of computer programming since each type of Data Structure has unique use cases and benefits. Arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees (such as binary trees and B-trees), and graphs are a few of the most widely used data structures (such as directed and undirected graphs). Designing effective data structures requires an understanding of their attributes.
data.question: What are the types of Data Structure?

footerFaq.text1: Overview of Data Structures and their types
footerFaq.text2: This chapter will introduce the concept of Data Structures, explain the importance of organizing data, and provide an overview of the different types of Data Structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs.
footerFaq.title: Introduction to Data Structures

footerFaq.text2: This chapter will dive into the details of Arrays and Linked Lists, explaining their differences, strengths, and weaknesses. You'll learn how to implement them in different scenarios and analyze their time and space complexity.
footerFaq.title: Arrays and Linked Lists

footerFaq.text2: In this chapter, you'll explore the concepts of Stacks and Queues, how they work, and their various applications. You'll also learn how to implement them using arrays and linked lists.
footerFaq.title: Stacks and Queues

courseList.description: Python is one of the most frequently used programming languages in the world and it is widely used in various fields including Web Development, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, and machine learning
courseList.aboutCourse: Python is one of the most frequently used programming languages in the world and it is widely used in various fields including Web Development, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, and machine learning. With Tap Academy’s online Python course you will learn python programming language through a unique and innovative approach that uses Augmented Reality to visualise the code and concepts which aids in better understanding and longer retention of concepts. At Tap Academy, we're committed to giving everyone access to a top-notch education. Our augmented reality-based Python course is made to make learning fun, interesting, and efficient. Join us today and start your journey towards becoming a Python expert! No prior coding knowledge is required to enrol to the course.

reviewList.reviewText:
I am really pleased with the experience I have in TapAcademy. For a person Who is looking to start his career in IT and looking to land his first job in the field, I will strongly recommend TapAcademy. Because what they teach there and the way they teach you, if you follow them properly, it is guaranteed to land your first job within the first two months. Their use of technologys and Augmented reality-based teaching will
make your learning more enjoyable and entertaining ,at the same time, more effective than any other conventional methods. I am really happy with the experience I have in TapAcademy.

Hi everyone my name is Shahbaj Husen. I am 2020 passout from Maharshi Dayanand University Rohtak.

I was not able to crack the interview even though I was from CS background before joining the TAP academy but after joining the Tap academy I became more confident because my technical skills increased only in two months. The teaching way of Rohit and Somanna sir is just awesome. They are using advance technology to teach like augmented reality and you would be added in slack group where you can ask the doubts 24*7. Along with Full stack development course they also have testing and DSA course which makes the course much more diverse and something we can learn more.

I have been placed in Infanion technology with the package of 3.5 lpa for the role of Software Developer Trainee.

Hi I’m kushal I’m pursuing my engineering in information science stream few months ago me and my friend thought of learning a technical skill and we attended the demo workshop of tapacademy which was a great experience learning a new skill in augmented reality and the great instructor who give the foundation of the skill Rohit sir and after learning the complete skills I gained 5 star badge in Hacker Rank platform and also I cleared 2 companies interview thou I’m still in 4th year I suggest you my friends to enrol in the Tap Academy.

My Experience in Tap Academy is so unique that the Academy made myself to believe about the extent i can go to achieve that i dreamt off, As The staff member are so hard working to make sure that every students can understand the logic in inside the world of Computer Programming languages, And the Academy is guiding me as well as Other friends who i have never met to find the right opportunity to explore ourself in different IT companies and help us to solve the problems which we are going to face in future which will test our talent, patience, skills for our own growth in the modernizing world.

It was good experience with the tap academy, i have learned coding from the scratch with the zero knowledge i had but now i know the basics of the web programming languages, it was very helpful for me to add to my resume as well. Thanks to Rohit sir who is the best Trainer i have came across and also Megha mam and everyone from the Tap academy who helped in this training. It's a great journey till now and i want to be perfect in this before the completion of the course.

Hi this is Chiranjeevi from Tap Academy , I am an Electrical student . I have joined in this Tap Academy in July month. When I joined actually I don't know much about programming, it was really hard time in my first month but after that a gradual increase in my programming knowledge I have seen inside me. I tried constantly to gain knowledge and all the faculty in the Tap Academy provided us best knowledge majorly in java Rohit sir and Megha ma'am . Now I'm very happy that my programming background is good . The way of teaching and knowledge gave by Rohit sir I could not forget in my life time , tq Rohit Sir and Megha ma'am.

Hi, I joined Tap Academy and got placed in 2weeks. I like The AR classes and Rohith sir teaching way concepts. I recommend you to join for best placement opportunities and upskilling your knowledge. I got placed Pelatro with 6.5LPA.

Hello Everyone. My name is Yash Dipt. Recently, I completed an MCA for the year 2022. TAP Academy has so far been a good experience for me. Excellent course materials are available. Augmented reality is used to learn from real-world scenarios, which greatly aids in visualizing and logical thinking. After three and a half months, I was assigned to the Torry Harris Integration Solution with 4LPA. excellent place to begin learning programming. I want to sincerely thank Rohit Sir, Somanna Sir, and every member of the TAP Academy for their assistance. TAP Academy is the place to learn if you want to get your first IT job.

A big thanks to Tap academy , finally i got placed. It was really a great experience in learning Tap Academy and also best decision of my life.They'll teach u from core of any language so that even a non technical student can understand easily and also u'll get great knowledge n confidence too. The staff members are really supportive they'll clear your each n every doubt with a great patience, the  way they explain the concepts is really an impressive way , once again thank you tap academy for making my dream come to.

Hi all, i got placed in Torry Harris integrated solutions and my package is 4LPA. I joined tap academy in the month of august with in two months i got placed thank you to Tap academy
Because the way they teach us they use argument reality to teach the concepts, this is very helpful to understand the concepts from memory point of view and I am basically from Electrical and Electronics domain but now i am capable of solving coding questions soo thank you to tap academy i would like to thank Rohit sir for teaching concept in memory point
of view, somanna sir because he teaches how to implement the concepts in coding and thank you megha mam for everyday class reminders thank you rakshith sir for soft skills.
